title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: New files created on Windows have Windows line delimiters, and there is no UI option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values are Dos / Windows Mac Unix default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.
SR: Consider the following scenario: Unix and Windows workstations are used to develop a Unix product/program.
